PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Estudo das propriedades magnйticas de nanopartнculas e filmes ultrafinos de Pd (FAPESP R$270.000,00)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
Nonopartнculas e filmes ultrafinos apresentam, em muitas situaзхes, propriedades distintas daquelas do material massivo. Estes desempenham um papel importante e de grande impacto na ciкncia e tecnologia moderna de materiais. As peculiares propriedades eletrфnicas, quнmicas, уticas e magnйticas em nanopartнculas sгo afetadas por seu tamanho (size-effect). De forma similar, filmes ultrafinos crescidos em substratos com diferentes simetrias cristalinas podem ter suas propriedades eletrфnicas, estruturais e magnйticas fortemente influenciadas pelo arranjo atфmico dos бtomos da superfнcie do substrato, bem como, espessura do filme e condiзхes termodinвmicas de crescimento.
Dentre os efeitos anфmalos de nanopartнculas e filmes finos estб a observaзгo de ferromagnetismo em metais nobres e de transiзгo que nгo sгo ferromagnйticos na sua forma massiva. Estes inesperados comportamentos magnйticos foram recentemente previstos teoricamente usando cбlculos de primeiros princнpios e comprovados em alguns poucos trabalhos experimentais. 
Neste projeto, o aluno irб caracterizar amostras de nanopartнculas de Au e Pd (jб sintetizadas por diferentes rotas quнmicas) quanto as suas propriedades magnйticas, correlacionando as mesmas com as propriedades estruturais e eletrфnicas das partнculas. As tйcnicas utilizadas serгo o dicroнsmo circular magnйtico de raios X (XMCD), espectroscopias de fotoelйtrons (XPS) e de absorзгo de raios X (XAS). 
O objetivo principal serб confirmar ou nгo a existкncia de ferromagnetismo nas nanopartнculas e identificar se a origem do mesmo. 
Em uma segunda etapa, filmes ultrafinos de Pd (um paramagnйtico de Pauli aumentado) serгo crescidos por MBE em Ru(0001), C(0001) e Nb(100). A idйia й verificar a possibilidade de induzir ferromagnetismo nestes filmes puramente atravйs de mecanismos eletrфnicos e estruturais. Estes tambйm serгo caracterizados com respeito as suas propriedades magnйticas (XMCD), eletrфnicas (XPS e XANES) e estruturais (EXAFS).

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Electronic and geometric structure of nano-materials: synchrotron radiation studies
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Designing a surface with predefined characteristics to work as a catalyst for a specific reaction, or to have specific magnetic properties, or to have a stable interface with an underling support (as is needed for high k materials on a silicon wafer to produce nano CMOS semiconductor device) has been the long-term goal of many surface scientists. So far it has been a elusive goal, but one can be absolutely convinced that any progress in this direction will be based on a complete understanding of the inter play between electronic structure and the position of the atoms on the surface or at an interface. These atoms find themselves in an environment that has few symmetries, nearest neighbors can be different from site to site, atomic distances likewise. Over all it is the electronic structure of the atoms that defines these features, but sometimes the atomic arrangement can influence the electronic structure. The study of this kind of inter-relation requires the use of different experimental techniques and computational approaches. In Brazil very few centers have groups that have these kinds of capabilities. In this thematic project we will try to update the experimental infrastructure operated by the Surface Group in 'Campinas' (UNICAMP/LNLS/ UFSCAR) and use the research and 'training' associated with a DFG/IRTG project with Uni Dortmund to help develop our experimental and theoretical capabilities. We will explore these interactions basically in the types of structure, surface alloys, metal oxide nanoparticle systems and semiconductor oxide interfaces, using XPS, PED and STM. Systems with catalytic properties, magnetic properties or electronic properties will be studied.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Production and characterization of monolayers of hybrid Dirac material: graphene and dichalcogenides
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Most of the materials formed by two-dimensional layers, such as graphene, dichalcogenides, among other materials that show graphene-like properties are nowadays known as Dirac materials. Such materials have a large potential for high-tech applications, as well as they represent a perfect playground for development and understanding of new physics phenomena that emerges due the quantum confinement of states that are naturally present when synthetized as monolayers, an effect of the two-dimensional geometry constrain. Despite the fascinating properties of these materials, there are still some obstacles inherent to the material itself and the methods of fabrication to establish large-scale production of high-technological devices. For instance, graphene is a zero gap semiconductor, while some dichalcogenides shows gap opening. The exfoliated graphene or dichalcogenides do not allow industrial scale production. On other hand, CVD or MBE growth methods for dichalcogenides are still under development. It is possible to grow epitaxial graphene on large scale by different methods. However, the fine control of the number of layer for graphene grown on the insulating SiC was not archived until now. Finally, without finding a method to open the gap in graphene, and isolating the epitaxial graphene grown on metals, its application will remain only for research purposes and proof of concepts. Therefore, several efforts to develop new methods of production and functionalization of these materials have been proposed in the literature. An important example is the graphene on Ir(111). Ir(111) is the unique transition metal substrate that allow graphene epitaxial growth by CVD, single layer, single orientation domain and quasi free-standing. In this project we propose to study the functionalization of graphene grown on transition metals, particularly on Ir(111) with two main goals: 1- establish an efficient method to isolate high-quality graphene from the Ir(111); 2- produce hybrid Dirac materials by combining graphene and other materials such as insolating and oxides as well as dichalcogenides. Those hybrid materials could play an important role for the development of future Dirac materials based devices.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Towards the engineering of functional molecular architectures: studying the adsorption behavior of novel porphyrin derivatives on well-defined metal surfaces (CAPES/DAAD 23038.006809/2014-27: R$ 104.346,00)
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
The collaborative project will focus on the investigation of 5,10,15,20 tetraphenyl¬tetra-benzo¬porphyrins (TPBP). The molecular material was synthesized by the group of Prof. Dr. Norbert Jux from Erlangen with three different metal centers namely Cu, Ni and Pd (CuTPBP, NiTPBP, PdTPBP). In perspective also the corresponding 5,10,15,20-Tetrakis-(4-tert-butyl)-phenyl¬tetra¬benzo¬porphyrins (TTBPBP), i.e. with additional tert-butyl groups at the 4-position of the phenyl groups would be available to modify the intermolecular interactions.
The main course of action is described in the scientific goals section above. The reference sample will be the Cu(111) surface with which both groups are experienced.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Crescimento de monocamadas de Dicalcogenetos de Metais de Transiзгo por MBE e PVD e sua caracterizaзгo eletrфnica e estrutural
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Semicondutores de materiais bidimensionais formados por dicalcogenetos de metais de transiзгo (TMD) tкm sido extremamente estudados nos ъltimos anos. As tйcnicas mais empregadas para se obter algumas camadas sгo a esfoliaзгo mecвnica e o mйtodo de crescimento CVD, os quais nгo permitem o escalonamento para produзгo industrial de dispositivos optoeletrфnicos. Neste projeto propomos o crescimento dos TMDs tais como MoTe2, HfTe2, MoS2 e HfS2 utilizando uma combinaзгo de mйtodos de crescimento: Molecular Beam Epitaxy (MBE) e Physical Vapor Deposition (PVD). Os principais substratos de interesse serгo superfнcies bem ordenadas e monocristalinas tais como o sobre Gr/Ir(111) e Gr/SiC(0001) alйm de monocristais metбlicos tais como o Au(111) e Au(788), este ъltimo com o intuito de induzir o crescimento de nanofitas de TMD. A caracterizaзгo estrutural e eletrфnica dos filmes serб feita por espectroscopia de fotoelйtrons excitados por raios X (XPS) e difraзгo de fotoelйtrons (XPD) (se o filme apresentar ordenamento azimutal), alйm de caracterizaзгo estrutural via microscopia de tunelamento de elйtrons (STM). Tйcnicas complementares como Raman e ARPES (no sнncrotron) serгo empregadas para as melhores amostras. Ao final objetivamos estabelecer mйtodos de crescimento de monocamadas hнbridas (TMD1+TMD2) ou TMD/Gr e ainda TMD/isolante (o caso do h-BN).

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.NOME-DO-PROJETO: Architecting new carbon allotropes with atomically precise doping by functional groups via on-surface synthesis of covalent organic frameworks
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
This project is a collaborative effort in the framework of PROBRAL-20201927496P program supporte by CAPES and DAAD. 
In this project, we are particularly interested in systematically investigating the electronic and atomic structure of new complex organic nanostructures based on doped graphene and porous networks. Part of the study will be based on scanning tunneling microscopy (STM), scanning tunneling spectroscopy (STS) and atomic force microscopy (AFM) that will provide local information. X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS) will provide area-integrated information regarding the chemical composition of the sample. Accurate information about the band structure will be obtained by angle-resolved photoelectron spectroscopy (ARPES). Very little information is available about the band structure of COFs, including nanoporous graphenes, precisely because it is difficult to obtain samples with high order and single or few domains. To induce a single domain orientation, we will use template substrates, such as vicinal surfaces. Several examples of confinement of molecular systems and induction of preferential ordering are discussed in the literature, for instance by De Fayter et al. [38], and have been used by our groups in Erlangen and Campinas in several other studies [49-52, 52a,52b]. For example, the synthesis of GNR and N-GNR from di-bromo-p-terphenyl (PPP) and PPP doped with 1 or 2 nitrogens on Au(887) [39] was recently reported. In these studies, the electronic bandstructure of the material was also successfully studied by ARPES.
The goal of our project is to establish and promote a binational research collaboration, which can serve as platform for future cooperations. This shall be established via bilateral exchange of PhD students and postdocs, which will allow them for gaining international research experience. The expertise of the two applying partners is complementary, so that the young researchers will receive training at an international level using experimental equipment and techniques, which are not available at their home institutions. The scientific results will be published as joint articles in international high-level peer-reviewed journals and will be presented at international conferences. We expect that the young researchers will strongly benefit from this project and the international exchange, in terms of establishing internationals networks, experience and reputation.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO:
Este projeto de pesquisa estб integrado a um esforзo maior para desenvolver um
programa amplo do estudo da interaзгo de gases, com relevante interesse em catбlise como
CO, CO2, O2, N2, NO, CH4 e SOn, com filmes metбlicos ultrafinos e nanopartнculas
metбlicas (Pd, Pt, Au, Ni, Fe), crescidos sobre filmes de уxidos suportados em monocristais
metбlicos e semicondutores, tipicamente Al2O3, MgO e Cr2O3 sobre Ag(111), Pd(111),
Pt(111), Cu(100) e Si(100). O projeto foi idealizado em trкs fases fundamentais: 1Є fase ?
caracterizaзгo estrutural e eletrфnica dos filmes de уxidos suportados, 2Є fase ? crescimento
de filmes ultrafinos metбlicos sobre os уxidos, 3Є fase ? estudo da interaзгo de gases com
estas superfнcies em condiзхes controladas de temperatura e pressгo. Os mйtodos
experimentais utilizados para a investigaзгo da estrutura eletrфnica e cristalogrбfica sгo os
jб rotineiramente utilizados como XPS, UPS, LEED, RHEED, XPD, NEXAFS e EXAFS,
na sua maioria baseados no uso de radiaзгo sнncrotron. Para iniciarmos a fase que
envolverб o crescimento in-situ dos filmes metбlicos sobre os уxidos suportados,
necessitaremos mais duas evaporadora do tipo MBE por bombardeamento de elйtrons, para
a qual a tecnologia de construзгo jб foi desenvolvida no LNLS. Para estudar a iteraзгo dos
gases com estas superfнcies serгo utilizadas diferentes tйcnicas de alta sensibilidade а
superfнcie como XPS e UPS com a utilizaзгo de radiaзгo sнncrotron, bem como medidas de
dessorзгo tйrmica (TPD/S-Temperature Programmed Desorption/Spectroscopy). Este
projeto deverб desenvolver basicamente a segunda e terceira fase propostas acima. Na
terceira fase, alйm das tйcnicas tradicionais e a instalaзгo da nova tйcnica de TDS.

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: Desenvolvimento de um codigo para calculo da forma de linha de transicoes Auger

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-2.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Estrutura Eletrфnica de Бtomos e Molйculas; Teoria

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Foi desenvolvido um codigo em Fortran portavel para varios sistemas (Windows, Linux, Unix) capaz de calcular a a distribuicao de multipletos e probabilidade de transicao em uma recombinicacao Auger convencional; e com isso simular a forma de linha deste tipo de transicao eletronica. O programa e capas de calcular em 3 diferentes modos de acoplamento do estado inicial e final (jj,LS, e IC-Intermediate coupling).

DADOS-BASICOS-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONC.TITULO: Calculo da Estrutura eletronica de atomos excitados

DETALHAMENTO-DE-OUTRAS-ORIENTACOES-CONCL.NOME-DA-AGENCIA: Conselho Nacional de Desenvolvimento Cientнfico e Tecnolуgico

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-3.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Estrutura Eletrфnica de Бtomos e Molйculas; Teoria

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Neste trabalho o aluno desenvolveu partes de um codigo em fortran para calculos da estrutura eletronica de atomos excitados em multiplas configuracoes do estado inicial e final, resolvendo por metodos numericos a equacoes de Dirac. Tambem foi desenvolvida uma interface amigavel em Clipper que pode ser rodada em um PC (Dos ou Windows).
